GSD.description:
USB: host: isp116x: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 7bffda1560a6f255fdf504e059fbbdb5d46b9e44. For more details please see the references link.
